Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan captain Ibrahim Zadran announced that ace spinner Rashid Khan will not be participating in any of the three matches due to his recovery from lower back surgery.
In Rashid Khan’s absence, Afghanistan’s spin workload in India will be shared between Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Mohammad Nabi, Noor Ahmad, Qais Ahmad, and Sharafuddin Ashraf.
Qais Ahmad took the most wickets in the UAE series, with six at an average of 11.16 and an economy rate of 6.70.
